Chapter 5 Output files 5.1 Output file names

Chapter 5 Output files 5.1 Output file names Format of output file names: [Project Name].[Identifier].[Format] -The [Project Name] is user defined name of the project, so every input and output files must start with the [Project Name]. -The [Format] is one of csv or dat. csv is spreadsheet format and dat is bindary format. The [Identifier] is a combination of variables features, that in format of: [Model Unit][Variable Type][Variable Name]. [Model Unit] is one of three options of ele (elemtns), riv (river) or lak (lake). Variable type includes y, v and q that are state variable (in \(L\)), specific flux (in \(L^3/L^2/T\)) and flux (in \(L^3/T\)) respectively. The list of output files is in following table. Identifier Model unit Var Type Var Name Meaning Unit Old name .eleyic. ele y ic Storage of Interception \(m\) .ic .eleysnow. ele y snow Storage of Interception \(m\) .snow .eleysurf. ele y surf Storage of surface \(m\) .surf .eleyunsat. ele y unsat Storage of unsaturated zone \(m\) .unsat .eleygw. ele y gw Groundwater head \(m\) .GW .elevetp. ele v etp Potential ET \(\frac{m^3}{m^2 d}\) - .elevetic. ele v etic Evaporation from interception \(\frac{m^3}{m^2 d}\) .ET0 .elevettr. ele v ettr Transpiration \(\frac{m^3}{m^2 d}\) .ET1 .elevetev. ele v etev Soil Evaporation \(\frac{m^3}{m^2 d}\) .ET2 .elevprcp. ele v prcp Precipitation \(\frac{m^3}{m^2 d}\) - .elevnetprcp. ele v netprcp Net Precipitation \(\frac{m^3}{m^2 d}\) - .elevinfil. ele v infil Infiltration Rate \(\frac{m^3}{m^2 d}\) .infil .elevrech. ele v rech Recharge Rate \(\frac{m^3}{m^2 d}\) .Rech .eleqsurf. ele q surf Overland flow \(m^3/d\) .fluxsurf .eleqsub. ele q sub Subsurface flow \(m^3/d\) .fluxsub .rivystage. riv y stage River Stage \(m\) stage .rivqup. riv q up Water flux from upstream \(m^3/d\) .rivflx0 .rivqdown. riv q down Water flux to downstream \(m^3/d\) .rivflx1 .rivqsurf. riv q surf Water flux from landsurface \(m^3/d\) .rivflx1,2 .rivqsub. riv q sub Water flux from subsurface \(m^3/d\) .rivflx4~8 PIHM++ PIHM 2.2 *.eleysurf.csv .surf *.eleyunsat.csv .unsat *.eleysnow.csv .snow *.eleygw.csv .GW *.eleyic.csv .ic *.elevetp.csv - *.elevetic.csv .et0 *.elevettr.csv .et1 *.elevetev.csv .et2 *.eleveta.csv - *.eleysurf.csv *.eleysurf.csv *.eleysurf.csv
